title: The Best Tech Under $50 - December 2016
description: Krystal's 2016 Holiday Tech Guide!  Philips Hue Motion Sensor:  SHIRTS ARE HERE! :D    Why I'm wearing glasses lol   To enter this gift guide just make sure you're subscribed here on TLD and then Krystal's channel (linked above). Contest will run for 1 week and we'll announce the winners on Twitter! Follow us to stay updated!     Philips Hue Motion Sensor -  Amazon Echo Dot -  Status BT-1 Headphones -  Superlux HD668B Headphones -  Google Chromecast -  Avantree Bluetooth Transmitter -  BHOLD Acoustic Pod -  Samsung PRO+ SD Card -  Oittm Apple Watch Car Charger -  TP-Link Smart Plug -   Add me on Snapchat!  My Gear:  Instagram:
